cause.description:
The misson of La Leche League is to help mothers worldwide to breastfeed through mother-to-mother support, encouragement, information, and education, and to promote a better understanding of breastfeeding as an important element in the healthy development of the baby and mother.
*** PLEASE NOTE *** This Cause is intended to benefit La Leche League Canada. The Facebook Causes application is NOT currently able to accept donations to non-US (ie. Canadian) charities and movements, so we welcome your donation using the following links: To DONATE now: www.canadahelps.org Other ways to support La Leche League Canada: http://www.lllc.ca/support.php For more Information: www.lllc.ca
1. Mothering through breastfeeding is the most natural and effective way of understanding and satisfying the needs of the baby.
2. Breast milk is the superior infant food.
3. Good nutrition means eating a well-balanced and varied diet of foods in as close to their natural state as possible.
cause.mission: to help mothers worldwide to breastfeed
cause.name: La Leche League Canada
